  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2887</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2887</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Autumn</string>
            <string language="en">Autumn</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Herbst</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Automne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Outono</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Autunno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φθινόπωρο</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva amb  tres apartats (Presentació, Avalua't i Practica) sobre la tardor. Presenta tres poemes amb exercicis interactius de comprensió, discriminació i identificació de sons. Inclou una pràctica d'enregistrament de veu sobre els poemes treballats.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) in three sections (introduction, self-assessment and practice). It presents three poems with interactive exercises on comprehension, discrimination and identifying sounds. It includes practice with a recording of the poems.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">llengua anglesa</string>
            <string language="en">English language</string>
            <string language="es">lengua inglesa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">poesia</string>
            <string language="en">poetry</string>
            <string language="es">poesía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">temps</string>
            <string language="en">time</string>
            <string language="es">tiempo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vocabulari</string>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
            <string language="es">vocabulario</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) in drei Kapiteln (Einleitung, Selbstbewertung und Praxis). 
Er stellt drei Gedichte mit interaktiven Übungen auf Erfassen 
dar, Unterscheidung und Kennzeichnentöne. Er schließt Praxis 
mit einer Aufnahme der Gedichte ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) 
dans trois sections (introduction, art de l'auto-portrait-assessment et pratique). 
Elle présente trois poésies avec des exercices interactifs sur
la compréhension, discrimination et des bruits d'identification. 
Elle inclut la pratique avec un enregistrement des poésies.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) em três
seções (introdução, self-assessment e prática). Apresenta 
três poemas com exercícios interativos na compreensão, 
discriminação e sons identificar. Inclui a prática com uma 
gravação dos poemas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) in 
tre sezioni (introduzione, valutazione di se stesso e pratica). 
Presenta tre poems con le esercitazioni interattive sulla 
comprensione, distinzione e suoni identificare. Include la 
pratica con una registrazione dei poems.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) σε τρία 
τμήματα (εισαγωγή, αυτοαξιολόγηση και πρακτική). 
Παρουσιάζει τρία ποιήματα με τις διαλογικές ασκήσεις στην 
κατανόηση, τη διάκριση και τον προσδιορισμό των ήχων. 
Περιλαμβάνει την πρακτική με μια καταγραφή των ποιημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">poésie</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
